text: Lea is a Gold who was a midDraft of House Mars and an ally to Darrow during his year at The Institute.
name: Lea

text: Known as being very pretty, Lea was a rather weak Gold in comparison to other Golds. However, she grew out of her timid personality with the help of Darrow.
name: Lea

text: Lea was taken by Antonia au Severus-Julii and Vixus while her and Roque were alone together, throwing him off a cliff. She was then killed at the Institute in a ploy by Antonia au Severus-Julii and her gang just to get Darrow alone. Darrow had built a cairn atop her body, but wolves had dug in and had stolen her body.
name: Lea

text: She developed a romantic relationship with Roque au Fabii during her time at the Institute.
name: Lea
